content: witch hat i wanted a witch hat for my ren fest costume but couldn t find a pattern for the image i had in my head so i set about creating my own i hope you like this pattern the hat as written should fit a medium size head my head is 22 inches materials 5mm hook - worsted weight yarn - i used red heart stripes in favorite stripe jewelry wire - i think i used 18g or 20g - basically something sturdy enough to hold the brim up but not so thick that it s hard to work with scissors stitch marker needle for weaving in end the flower vine is the pattern flower fairy vines by claire olivia golden worked in rounds - top down - brim is joined with a slip_stitch at the end of every round 1 single_crochet 6 into magic_ring 2-21 single_crochet around 20r of 6 22 increase single_crochet 5 7 from this point all stitches will be half_double_crochet 23 increase half_double_crochet 6 8 24 increase half_double_crochet 7 9 25 increase half_double_crochet 8 10 26 half_double_crochet around 10 27 increase half_double_crochet 9 11 28 increase half_double_crochet 10 12 29 half_double_crochet around 12 30 increase half_double_crochet 3 around 15 31 half_double_crochet around 15 32 increase half_double_crochet 4 around 18 33 increase half_double_crochet 2 around 24 34 half_double_crochet around 24 35 increase half_double_crochet 3 around 30 36 half_double_crochet around 30 37 increase half_double_crochet 4 around 36 38 half_double_crochet around 36 39 increase half_double_crochet 5 around 42 40 half_double_crochet around 42 41 increase half_double_crochet 6 around 48 42 increase half_double_crochet 7 around 54 43-44 half_double_crochet around 54 45 increase half_double_crochet 8 around 60 46-47 half_double_crochet around 60 48 increase half_double_crochet 9 around 66 49-50 half_double_crochet around 66 51 single_crochet slip_stitch into next now you will create the brim round 52 is worked into the front loop only - take your wire and first curl the end to kind of hide the sharp end you will be holding the wire and crocheting over it i made my end coils a little bigger so that i could just incorporate them into the design of the hat brim 57 ch1 increase single_crochet 18 around 120 fo weave in end coil end of wire i hooked my end wire coil around the beginning coil and flattened them as good as i could to the brim of the hat i added the flower fairy vine to my hat then attached some cute little potion bottles and some old looking copper keys to it as well any decoration
